events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit at all and I cannot use it.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Jessica M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please confirm your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, could you send us a copy of the purchase receipt and the reason for returning the jacket in detail?
Here is my order number 123456, and I am unhappy because the jacket is too large and looks very different from the size chart.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process for you immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email to you.
Thanks for the quick response. I’ve received the label and will send the jacket back by tomorrow.
We confirm receipt of the returned jacket and have processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund was successful and no further issues were reported, we are now closing your case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to get your feedback on your recent support experience. Your input is very valuable to us.
